NO_GUILD_MEMBERSHIP: No guild membership. Join or create a guild to continue.
CANNOT_CHANGE_OWN_ROLE: Cannot change your own guild role
CANNOT_DEMOTE_LAST_ADMIN: Cannot demote the last guild admin
NOT_GUILD_MEMBER: Not a member of this guild
CANNOT_LEAVE_LAST_ADMIN: Cannot leave guild: you are the last admin. Promote another user to admin first.
CANNOT_LEAVE_SOLE_PM: Cannot leave guild: you are the sole project manager. Promote another member first.
INVITE_EXPIRED_OR_USED: Invite has expired or has already been used
INITIATIVE_NOT_A_MEMBER: Not a member of this initiative
INITIATIVE_CANNOT_MODIFY_PM_PERMISSIONS: Project Manager permissions cannot be modified
INITIATIVE_CANNOT_CHANGE_BUILTIN_MANAGER: Cannot change manager status for built-in roles
INITIATIVE_MUST_HAVE_MANAGER: At least one manager role with members must remain
INITIATIVE_USER_NOT_IN_GUILD: User is not part of this guild
INITIATIVE_MUST_HAVE_PM: Initiative must have at least one project manager
INITIATIVE_ROLE_HAS_MEMBERS: Cannot delete role: members are still assigned to it
PROJECT_NO_ACCESS: You don't have access to this project
PROJECT_PIN_PERMISSION_REQUIRED: Only guild admins and initiative managers can pin projects
PROJECT_DOCUMENT_WRONG_INITIATIVE: Document belongs to a different initiative
PROJECT_CANNOT_ASSIGN_OWNER_TO_ROLE: Cannot assign owner permission to a role
PROJECT_ROLE_WRONG_INITIATIVE: Role must belong to the project's initiative
TASK_ALREADY_IN_PROJECT: Task already belongs to this project
TASK_CANNOT_MOVE_TO_TEMPLATE: Cannot move task to a template project
TASK_PROJECT_MISMATCH: Task does not belong to this project
TASK_STATUS_NOT_FOUND_FOR_PROJECT: Task status not found for this project
TASK_ASSIGNEES_NOT_FOUND: One or more assignees not found
TASK_TAGS_NOT_FOUND: One or more tags not found
SUBTASK_NOT_FOUND_FOR_TASK: Subtask not found for this task
TASK_STATUS_CANNOT_REMOVE_LAST: Cannot remove the final status for this category
TASK_STATUS_FALLBACK_REQUIRED: A fallback status is required when tasks exist
TASK_STATUS_FALLBACK_MUST_DIFFER: Fallback status must be different from the deleted status
TASK_STATUS_FALLBACK_CATEGORY_MISMATCH: Fallback status must share the same category
TAG_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: A tag with this name already exists
DOCUMENT_NO_ACCESS: You don't have access to this document
DOCUMENT_TITLE_ALREADY_EXISTS: A document with this title already exists in this initiative
DOCUMENT_USER_MUST_BE_MEMBER: User must be an initiative member
DOCUMENT_CANNOT_ASSIGN_OWNER_TO_ROLE: Cannot assign owner permission to a role
DOCUMENT_ROLE_WRONG_INITIATIVE: Role must belong to the document's initiative
DOCUMENT_AI_NATIVE_ONLY: AI summarization is only available for native documents
DOCUMENT_INVALID_TAG_IDS: One or more tag IDs are invalid
COMMENT_PARENT_MISMATCH: Parent comment belongs to a different entity
COMMENT_PROVIDE_ONE_ENTITY: Provide exactly one of task or document
COMMENT_AUTHOR_ONLY_EDIT: Only the comment author can edit
COMMENT_AUTHOR_ONLY_DELETE: You can only delete your own comments
COMMENT_NOT_LINKED: Comment is not linked to a task or document
SETTINGS_INITIATIVE_ID_REQUIRED: Initiative ID required for initiative mappings
SETTINGS_INITIATIVE_ROLE_ID_REQUIRED: Initiative role ID required for initiative mappings
SETTINGS_INITIATIVE_WRONG_GUILD: Initiative does not belong to the specified guild
SETTINGS_INITIATIVE_FIELDS_REQUIRED: Initiative ID and initiative role ID required for initiative mappings
ADMIN_CANNOT_RESET_INACTIVE: Cannot reset password for inactive user
ADMIN_CANNOT_CHANGE_OWN_ROLE: Cannot change your own platform role
ADMIN_CANNOT_DEMOTE_LAST_ADMIN: Cannot demote the last platform admin
ADMIN_USE_SELF_DELETION: Use the account settings page to delete your own account
ADMIN_CANNOT_DELETE_LAST_ADMIN: Cannot delete the last platform admin
ADMIN_CANNOT_DELETE_SELF: Cannot delete your own account through admin endpoint
ADMIN_PROJECT_TRANSFERS_REQUIRED: Project transfers required for hard delete when user owns projects
ADMIN_CANNOT_DEMOTE_LAST_GUILD_ADMIN: Cannot demote the last guild admin
ADMIN_CANNOT_DEMOTE_LAST_PM: Cannot demote the last project manager
USER_CANNOT_DELETE_LAST_ADMIN: Cannot delete the last platform admin account
USER_CONFIRMATION_MISMATCH: Confirmation text must be 'DELETE MY ACCOUNT'
USER_PROJECT_TRANSFERS_REQUIRED: You must specify transfer recipients for all owned projects
USER_MISSING_PROJECT_TRANSFERS: Missing transfer recipients for some projects
USER_INVALID_WEEK_START: Week start must be between 0 (Sunday) and 6 (Saturday)
USER_PLATFORM_ROLE_WRONG_ENDPOINT: Platform role changes must use the admin endpoint
USER_CANNOT_REMOVE_LAST_ADMIN: Cannot remove the last platform admin
USER_CANNOT_DELETE_SELF: You cannot delete your own account
